item.title: Azure Blogs
item.description: Pixel Robots - A Blog about Microsoft Azure and Sysadmin stuff… Gregor Suttie - Azure Greg Thomas Thornton - Blogging all things Microsoft Azure Joe Carlyle - WedoAzure Sam Smith - Learning and sharing Azure architecture tips with DevOps Dwayne Natwick - The Journey To The Cloud Continues ï¿½ Chris Pietschmann - Build5nines.com Alan Kinane - Azure Alan Jack Tracey - Cloud and Networking Vaibhav Gujral - Cloud Architect Pete Gallagher - Pete Codes Kirk Ryan - A blog about advanced Azure data services Adil Touati - Azure, DevOps and Kubernetes
